snippet: In an odd moment in the trial of Robel Phillipos, a friend of the man accused of the Boston Marathon bombings, Michael Dukakis, the former Massachusetts governor and 1988 Democratic presidential nominee, testified Thursday for the defense.
abstract: Michael Dukakis, former Massachusetts governor and 1988 Democratic presidential nominee, testifies for the defense in trial of Robel Phillipos, friend of accused Boston Marathon bomber Dzhokhar A Tsarnaev.
lead_paragraph: In an odd moment in the trial of Robel Phillipos, a friend of the man accused of the Boston Marathon bombings, Michael Dukakis, the former Massachusetts governor and 1988 Democratic presidential nominee, testified Thursday for the defense.

headline.main: Massachusetts: Dukakis Testifies in Bomb Trial
headline.print_headline: Massachusetts: Dukakis Testifies in Bomb Trial
